body: Of course ken gets the shaft...fucking asians man

So this is the origin story of the hadoken. Ryu gonna be at the bar one day and someone's going to ask when he came up with the hadouken and he'll be like; "So here I was fucking this futa and I shoved my fist up her ass, only I yelled hadouken when I did it. It just came to me" Then the person who asked will just get up and walk away.
Did Ryu really just yell Hadoken while fisting poison
Shots ryu and ken is something I never knew I wanted.
